resps: Developing a climate refugee mobile app to connect communities with shelters, jobs, healthcare, and resources during natural disasters.
Building end-to-end features in React Native, TypeScript, and Material UI, ensuring responsive, scalable, and user-friendly interfaces.
Collaborating with designers and product managers to translate wireframes into functional flows, integrating APIs, and maintaining clean, reusable code.
Contributing to accessibility, performance, and cross-platform optimization, supporting the app’s mission-critical use cases.
